page.title: 02FARMING 06200219
page.content: {FRINTON FARM PARTNERS FARM } This is an {arable}farm situated on the outskirts of Great Holland. There are fourteen fields, of 233.3 hectares. Six adults work on the farm. The{crops}are oil seed rape, grown for its oil extracts, and wheat. Last year's wheat was to Mistley for export. Grain which is not sold is stored on the farm in 1000tonne capacity barns, which are ventilated by under-floor vents to prevent the wheat from rotting. The farm is {managed} on behalf of a business consortium. There are very few owner-farmers in the area. The managing firm has final say in the management of the farm. There is no livestock on the farm although pigs were kept there at one time.Equipment is modern and includes an air-conditioned combine harvester.
